@Test public void testLargeValues(){
  int populationSize=3456;
  int sampleSize=789;
  int numberOfSucceses=101;
  double[][] data={{0.0,2.75646034603961e-12,2.75646034603961e-12,1.0},{1.0,8.55705370142386e-11,8.83269973602783e-11,0.999999999997244},{2.0,1.31288129219665e-9,1.40120828955693e-9,0.999999999911673},{3.0,1.32724172984193e-8,1.46736255879763e-8,0.999999998598792},{4.0,9.94501711734089e-8,1.14123796761385e-7,0.999999985326375},{5.0,5.89080768883643e-7,7.03204565645028e-7,0.999999885876203},{20.0,0.0760051397707708,0.27349758476299,0.802507555007781},{21.0,0.087144222047629,0.360641806810619,0.72650241523701},{22.0,0.0940378846881819,0.454679691498801,0.639358193189381},{23.0,0.0956897500614809,0.550369441560282,0.545320308501199},{24.0,0.0919766921922999,0.642346133752582,0.449630558439718},{25.0,0.083641637261095,0.725987771013677,0.357653866247418},{96.0,5.93849188852098e-57,1.0,6.01900244560712e-57},{97.0,7.96593036832547e-59,1.0,8.05105570861321e-59},{98.0,8.44582921934367e-61,1.0,8.5125340287733e-61},{99.0,6.63604297068222e-63,1.0,6.670480942963e-63},{100.0,3.43501099007557e-65,1.0,3.4437972280786e-65},{101.0,8.78623800302957e-68,1.0,8.78623800302957e-68}};
  testHypergeometricDistributionProbabilities(populationSize,sampleSize,numberOfSucceses,data);
}
